capetweaks.options.capeSub.relog: You may need to relog for changes to take effect.
capetweaks.saveError.description: Changes to settings will be lost
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.capetweak: This mod changes cape physics and lets you hide individual vanilla capes, all of this configurable. This mod does not add capes, and is intended for vanilla capes. Modded capes are not guaranteed to work.
